title: Cobalt site coordinated polyterthiophene derivant/hematite hybrid photoanode for light-driven water oxidation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2431-2436
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00389F, Communication
Wenhao Shang, Hao Yang, Yingzheng Li, Chang Liu, Ziqi Zhao, Yu Shan, Fei Li, Licheng Sun, Fusheng Li
The cobalt site-modified polymer could significantly promote charge transfer and reduce charge recombination of hematite for light-driven water oxidation.
